duration_in_months: ></proposed_date>：<expire_date>. It was the intention to conclude the contract on March 31, 2024. However, the details in the data don’t provide information which would have powered this correctly. Contract value was not detailed in the documentation supplied.
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal | Task and Solutions Professional Services for Staffing Consultant

**Project Notification**

The Government of Canada's [Fisheries and Oceans Canada](https://www.dfo-mpo.gc.ca/) is inviting proposals for the provision of Task and Solutions Professional Services for Staffing Consultant (1.8 - Expert-conseil en conception de la classification et en conception organisationnelle – niveau 3) through a Request for Proposal (RFP) process.

**Request Details**

| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number | PW-22-01009260 |
| Solicitation Number | 30002555 |
| Publication Date | October 5, 2022 |
| Tender Closing Date | October 20, 2022, 1:00 PM EDT |
| Procurement Category | SRV (Services) |

**Description of the Requirement**

The proposed duration of the contract shall be from the date of award to March 31, 2024. The required services will support the development of criteria and documentation to support staffing strategy and competitive processes for the Marine Planning and Conservation Directorate.

**Eligibility**

This RFP is open to companies who meet the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) trade agreements.

** Tender Documents**

The Request for Proposal document is available on the [CanadaBuys](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders/index.aspx) website. Tenderers must ensure that they comply with the instruction to tenderers in the RFP document and meet the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement eligibility requirements.

**Contracting Entity Information**

| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Contracting Entity Name | Fisheries and Oceans Canada |
| Contracting Entity Address | 200 Kent St, Station 13E228, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0E6 Canada |

**Contact Information**

| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Contact Name | Cal LaKing |
| Contact Title | Tenders Officer |
| Contact Email | [DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca) |
| Contact Phone Number | (506) 478-3581 |  |
